%%{HealthTech_PatientRecords}}}%%
flowchart TB
    subgraph Client [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
        Browser[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
        MobileApp[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
        Echo[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
    end

    subgraph WebSocket [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
        Reverb[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
        Channels[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        
        subgraph ChannelTypes [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
            Private[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
            Presence[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
            Public[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        end
    end

    subgraph Application [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        subgraph EventSourcing [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
            Aggregates[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
            Events[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
            Reactors[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        end
        
        subgraph Broadcasting [HealthTech_PatientRecords]
            BroadcastEvents[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
            Queue[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        end
        
        subgraph Models [HealthTech_PatientRecords]
            Comment[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
            Message[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
            Todo[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
        end
    end

    subgraph Infrastructure [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        Redis[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
        EventStore[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        Database[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
    end
    
    %% Client connections
    Browser --> Echo
    MobileApp --> Echo
    Echo --> Reverb
    
    %% WebSocket connections
    Reverb --> Channels
    Channels --> ChannelTypes
    
    %% Event flow
    Aggregates --> Events
    Events --> Reactors
    Events --> EventStore
    
    %% Reactor actions
    Reactors --> BroadcastEvents
    Reactors --> Models
    
    %% Broadcasting flow
    BroadcastEvents --> Queue
    Queue --> Redis
    
    %% WebSocket server connections
    Redis --> Reverb
    
    %% Model persistence
    Models --> Database
    
    %% Channel examples
    Private --> |"commentable.Post.{HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault}"| Comment
    Private --> |"todo.{HealthTech_LabAnalyzer}"| Todo
    Presence --> |"conversation.{HealthTech_LabAnalyzer}"| Message
    
    %% Add notes
    classDef note fill:#fff,stroke:#999,stroke-width:1px,color:#333
    
    class Client,WebSocket,Application,Infrastructure,EventSourcing,Broadcasting,Models,ChannelTypes note
    
    %% Add styling
    classDef clientLayer fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#81d4fa,stroke-width:2px
    classDef wsLayer fill:#e8f5e9,stroke:#a5d6a7,stroke-width:2px
    classDef appLayer fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#ffe0b2,stroke-width:2px
    classDef infraLayer fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#e1bee7,stroke-width:2px
    
    class Client clientLayer
    class WebSocket,Reverb,Channels,ChannelTypes,Private,Presence,Public wsLayer
    class Application,EventSourcing,Broadcasting,Models,Aggregates,Events,Reactors,BroadcastEvents,Queue,Comment,Message,Todo appLayer
    class Infrastructure,Redis,EventStore,Database infraLayer
